name: Deep Way To Basement
description:
Dog is asking for food. Need to bring it from the basement. It's deep, but it's definitely worth it. How ling is it? Nobody knows...

Links:

This project was made for LudumDare48 event.
Ludum Dare 48 Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/deep-way-to-basement
